content: This time, I probably have to do it myself, but it's still worth the try: Any volunteers for writing the CHANGELOG? :)
I'm on it :+1:

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6347

PR is up. This changelog is big. Please review, (but don't merge yet) so I can finish the release process this evening/tomorrow morning.

17 lint additions, 9 enhanced lints. But no ICE fixes or "Other" stuff. I think this is because these things are done by maintainers most of the time, but we were all busy reviewing and with IRL stuff in October.
We had 47 contributors for this (1.49 beta) release. Normally we have 30~35 contributors per release.

The release process is finished: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/pull/6347

I had to deploy the 1.48.0 documentation by hand, because of a GitHub Actions change, that broke the deploy job. This is already fixed on master (and beta) and should not happen in the next release.
